channel.title: Community Studios
channel.description:
Community studios offer classes, workshops, and studio space for local artists.
[For Residencies, see this Topic.](https://wiki.glazy.org/t/residencies/161)
##United States * Alabama * Alaska * Arizona * Arkansas * California http://www.berkeleypottersstudio.com/
* Colorado * Connecticut * Delaware * Florida http://www.moreanartscenter.org/center-for-clay/ * Georgia http://www.mudfire.com/ * Hawaii * Idaho * Illinois * Indiana Mary Anderson Art Center - https://www.facebook.com/maryandersoncenter/ * Iowa * Kansas * Kentucky AA Clay Studios and Gallery - https://alexadamsclaywork.com/ * Louisiana * Maine * Maryland http://www.baltimoreclayworks.org/ * Massachusetts http://mudflat.org/ , * Michigan * Minnesota https://www.northernclaycenter.org/
* Mississippi * Missouri * Montana * Nebraska * Nevada * New Hampshire * New Jersey * New Mexico * New York * North Carolina * North Dakota * Ohio * Oklahoma * Oregon * Pennsylvania https://www.theclaystudio.org/ [University City Arts League](http://www.ucartsleague.org/classes/listings/?semester=0&category=6&instructor=&age=&action=search)
* Rhode Island * South Carolina * South Dakota * Tennessee * Texas * Utah * Vermont * Virginia * Washington https://potterynorthwest.org/ * West Virginia * Wisconsin * Wyoming
----------
## China * Jingdezhen Pottery Workshop: http://potteryworkshop.com.cn/ Sanbao: http://chinaclayart.com/
----------
## Denmark Guldagergaard Ceramic Research Center https://ceramic.dk/
----------
## Italy La Meridiana http://www.lameridiana.fi.it
----------
## South Africa [Clay Hands](https://www.clayhands.co.za/)
----------
## The Netherlands EKWC https://sundaymorning.ekwc.nl/en/

item.title: Community Studios
item.dc:creator: ceramicswiki
item.description:
added! also your account upgraded to Moderator with Trust Level Leader. there are a bunch of in-built rules to prevent spammers from modifying Discourse, so new users are limited in what they can do. But we can revise the rules or alternatively verify and new users and raise their Trust Level.

Read full topic
